description:
Kibutsuji Muzan is a demon, the first of his kind, and the progenitor of most other demons. He is also the enemy of the Kamado family. He is the one that killed the Kamado family, turned http://anidb.net/ch103589 [Kamado Nezuko] into a http://anidb.net/ch99459 [demon] and made http://anidb.net/ch99458 [Kamado Tanjirou] an orphan.
Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki
name: Kibutsuji Muzan
